title: AI for .NET
description: Building AI-powered .NET applications using Microsoft.Extensions.AI abstractions. Use `IChatClient` for chat completions, `IEmbeddingGenerator` for embeddings, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for tool integration. Supports Azure OpenAI, OpenAI, Ollama, and other providers through a unified API.
shortDescription: AI integration with `IChatClient`, embeddings, and MCP for .NET apps.
